content.rendered:
Do you like match-3 games, candies, and delicious cakes? Solve sweet riddles, move puzzles, and collect culinary masterpieces! Train your brain by solving exciting puzzles! Rich graphics and pleasant music will help you relax to your advantage!
★ The goal of the game is to collect as many delicious candies as possible. To do this, combine plates with different pieces so that they merge into one large candy.★ The controls are simple. To move plates, hold down the left mouse button on a desktop or slide your finger across the screen on a mobile device.★ Become a candy making master and take first place on the leaderboard!
